qas.question: What sort of virus did Gaddafi describe HIV as?
Who did Gaddafi claim created H1N1?
According to Gaddafi, what insects made up God's armies?
What illnesses did Gaddafi claim would afflict invading colonialists?

context: Gaddafi was notably confrontational in his approach to foreign powers, and generally shunned western ambassadors and diplomats, believing them to be spies. He once said that HIV was "a <a0_0>peaceful<a0_0/> virus, not an aggressive virus" and assured attendees at the African Union that "if you are straight you have nothing to fear from AIDS". He also said that the H1N1 influenza virus was a biological weapon manufactured by <a1_0>a foreign military<a1_0/>, and he assured Africans that the <a2_0>tsetse fly and mosquito<a2_0/> were "God's armies which will protect us against colonialists". Should these 'enemies' come to Africa, "they will get <a3_0>malaria and sleeping sickness<a3_0/>".
